title: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin
notes: THE GAME INSTALLS AND STARTS FINE. MENUS WORK BUT ON GAME START THE PLAYER IS PRESENTED WITH A GREY SCREEN. I TRIED DISABLING ALL GRAPHICS SETTINGS AND PUTTING ANYTHING ELSE TO MINIMUM. NO EFFECT SO MUST BE SOMETHING MISSING OR BEING MISTRANSLATED BETWEEN DX11 AND VULKAN.

title: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin

notes: Games installs fine, can change settings. On starting the game there is a gray screen, audio is present. If you wait an in game cutscene starts then you can control your character to follow Alma. Next cutscene plays. But when you get to the actual mission start the mouse does not respond to input, keyboard input looks to be ok. It works in menus and in game objectives/PDA but not in the 3D environment. Makes the game unplayable.
title: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin

notes: Oddly, monitors and videos (i.e, a monitor in-game, playing a video) do no play, other than that the game has so far been running great.
title: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.12-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes:
Game works great. White screen for a minute when starting a new game, eventually after pressing W for a while you are able to play it.

Tends to crash once a while also.
title: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin

title: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon HD 7700 Series (CAPE VERDE, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
